name: The Seer
description:
For the human cities to be able to survive, every one of them holds a spiritual guide called The Seer, someone gifted with the hability to read the oracles and magically gifted. 

This story follows Coral and his boyfriend Andrew, as Coral tries to get chosen as the apprentice to be the new Seer, while being plagued by visions of a dark future, and the world's magic nature starts to reveal itself to Andrew as he tries to support his boyfriend during the hard task.

The game is mostly focused on their relationships with people and the world around them, with fantasy elements in the background.

CoralAndrewAmelie, "The Seer"Soon :)

A game made for the Yaoi Game Jam 2020. It's a visual novel with point-and-click elements, much more story focused than game-focused to be honest. It should be around 30 minutes, and doesn't have an ending yet.  Will it ever be completed?? Who knows. Not if I get depressed. Will work on grammar and on reducing the file size, it's mostly due to background resolutions needing to be adjusted.
